title: Science Microlearning Course Utilizing Personalized Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners access microlearning content (15-minute segments, 2-3 times weekly) via personal mobile devices, with learning activity data analyzed in real-time to provide personalized feedback

learning_goals: Based on individual learning progress and assessment results, learners receive weekly personalized feedback messages and adjust their learning plans accordingly.
Learners can deepen their understanding of topics of interest by utilizing additional science-related materials (videos, reading resources) recommended by the analytical system.

At the end of the course, learners submit a project-based assessment task, and they self-evaluate that timely resource guidance provided by the analytical system contributed to improving the completeness of the task.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
